news_header: Wolf food delivery service will test food transport using drones in winter conditions around Espoo Meadow.
news_text: Wolf, a food delivery service, is launching an experiment to transport food via drones during winter in the Espoo Meadow area. This initiative is not for commercial orders from the public and is in collaboration with the Irish drone company Manna, which has experience delivering to over 150,000 households in Ireland and the U.S. Drones will operate at altitudes of 60-70 meters and speeds up to 80 km/h, landing 15 meters from the customer to deliver orders using a rope. Foodora has also conducted drone food transport tests in Finland.
